    • Constructor Detail

      • MoveObject

        public MoveObject(int x,
                  int y,
                  processing.core.PImage sprite,
                  java.util.ArrayList<MapObjects> MapObjects,
                  java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> GameOriData,
                  java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,processing.core.PImage> ImgMap)
        Abstract class MoveObject, constructor set for son classes.
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate x.
        y - coordinate y.
        sprite - Image.
        MapObjects - A list conatin all mapObjects(),the objects could not move in the game.
        GameOriData - The game original Data read from json(i.e. speed).
        ImgMap - All images need to be used in this gmae.
